VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Luxury Fashion?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Luxury Fashion is arc {Sustainable Fashion}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Fast Fashion?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Fast Fashion is arc {Sustainable Fashion}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Sustainable Fashion} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Fast Fashion} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Luxury Fashion to Sustainable Fashion in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Sustainable Fashion to Fast Fashion in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Sustainable Fashion and Fast Fashion in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Sustainable Fashion and Fast Fashion is {862}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Luxury Fashion and Sustainable Fashion in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Luxury Fashion and Sustainable Fashion is {255}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Sustainable Fashion?
SC.A: The total flow output from Sustainable Fashion is {1223}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Fast Fashion?
SC.A: The total flow input by Fast Fashion is {1472}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 559? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {862} from {Sustainable Fashion} to {Fast Fashion}, a flow of {752} from {Fast Fashion} to {Sustainable Fashion}, a flow of {610} from {Luxury Fashion} to {Fast Fashion}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 559? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {509} from {Fast Fashion} to {Luxury Fashion}, a flow of {361} from {Sustainable Fashion} to {Luxury Fashion}, a flow of {255} from {Luxury Fashion} to {Sustainable Fashion}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 308 and 681? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {610} from {Luxury Fashion} to {Fast Fashion}, a flow of {509} from {Fast Fashion} to {Luxury Fashion}, a flow of {361} from {Sustainable Fashion} to {Luxury Fashion}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Luxury Fashion to Fast Fashion or from Sustainable Fashion to Luxury Fashion?
NC.A: The flow from {Luxury Fashion} to {Fast Fashion} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Sustainable Fashion to Luxury Fashion, from Fast Fashion to Luxury Fashion, or from Sustainable Fashion to Fast Fashion?
NC.A: The flow from {Sustainable Fashion} to {Fast Fashion} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Sustainable Fashion}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Fast Fashion} and {Sustainable Fashion}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Fast Fashion, Arc Sustainable Fashion, Arc Luxury Fashion}.
